name: ThisDot
description: An education and news focused web platform that facilitates the idea of learning through four main principles: Watch, Engage, Listen, and Learn.
goals: Create the Product Brand and UX/UI
solutions: We prepared Brading, POS material to support the community.
All UX/UI and Illustrations were covered by Valor Software team.
Webflow was selected as the main development tool.
outcome: An educational web-based platform, which helps to raise JS community, create the most suitable education business model and encourage knowledge sharing through video and courses.
